articles.description: Luke Littler and Michael van Gerwen in third-round action at the PDC World Darts Championship at Alexandra Palace - follow live updates.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship LIVE: Chris Dobey v Josh Rock before Luke Littler in third round - scores, results & updates

articles.description: Nitish Kumar Reddy hits a superb first Test century to keep India in the fourth Test - but Australia remain in a strong position at the end of day three.
articles.title: Australia v India: Nitish Kumar Reddy hits century in fourth Test

articles.description: A late equaliser from Marco Brescianini keeps Atalanta top of Serie A as they earn a point at Lazio.
articles.title: Lazio 1-1 Atalanta: Late Marco Brescianini equaliser keeps Atalanta top of Serie A

articles.description: Goalkeeper Alisson urges his Liverpool team-mates to "create our own history" as they chase the Premier League title in their first season under Arne Slot.
articles.title: Liverpool goalkeeper Alisson urges team-mates to "create own history"

articles.description: There are only two English managers or head coaches in the Premier League, a lower total than ever before - but why?
articles.title: Premier League: Why are there only two English managers in top flight?

articles.description: Ryan Searle loses thriller to Ryan Joyce before wins for Nathan Aspinall and Ricardo Pietreczko at the PDC World Championship.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025 results: Ryan Searle out after thriller but Nathan Aspinall advances

articles.description: Nick Kyrgios says the high-profile doping cases involving Grand Slam winners Jannik Sinner and Iga Swiatek are "disgusting" for tennis.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner and Iga Swiatek doping cases 'disgusting' for tennis - Nick Kyrgios

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on multi-instrumentalist Emma-Jean Thackray with his predictions for the final Premier League fixtures of 2024 and the New Year's Day game between Brentford and Arsenal.
articles.title: Premier League predictions: Chris Sutton v Emma-Jean Thackray

articles.description: Puerto Rico's champion boxer Paul Bamba has died at the age of 35 less than a week after his last fight.
articles.title: Paul Bamba: Puerto Rican champion boxer dies aged 35

articles.description: Ulster end a run of five straight defeats as their youngsters impress in a 17-7 United Rugby Championship away win over misfiring Connacht.
articles.title: Connacht 7-17 Ulster: Visitors earn battling URC victory in Galway
